column1: Inspection said good site - steep slope down to north
Location unknown, but this NGR fits with altitude, location description and proximity to New Gauge location
In the early years the gauge was rarely read. Although there were attempts to split some of them into months from referencing the Cowsic Valley station I am quoting the values as originally given
The values in 1903 are not bracketed, but are similar to the readings which are bracketed, so given as such
1904 The rainfall of the first two quarters probably exceeded the capacity of the gauge
Annual values rejected from survey map 1929
